statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption
SELECT process_id, timestamp, energy_value FROM energy_consumption
SELECT process_id, location_id, energy_value, timestamp FROM energy_consumption
SELECT timestamp, energy_value, location_id, process_id FROM energy_consumption
SELECT location_id, process_id, timestamp, energy_value FROM energy_consumption
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_value) AS total_energy FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location_id HAVING SUM(energy_value) > 1000 ORDER BY total_energy DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT process_id) AS unique_processes FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_value > 500 ORDER BY energy_value ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(energy_value) AS avg_energy_per_process FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY process_id ORDER BY avg_energy_per_process DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT process_id, process_name, energy_usage, time_stamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT process_id, process_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE time_stamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT improvement_id, improvement_description, improvement_date FROM energy_improvement ORDER BY improvement_date;
SELECT process_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage < 5000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC, time_stamp ASC;
SELECT process_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT process_name, improvement_description FROM energy_consumption JOIN energy_improvement ON energy_consumption.process_id = energy_improvement.process_id;
SELECT process_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY process_name;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS average_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT process_name, energy_type FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, country_code FROM process_location WHERE country_code='US';
SELECT process_id, energy_type, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption JOIN energy_savings ON energy_consumption.process_id = energy_savings.process_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT process_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_type='Electricity';
SELECT process_name, savings_amount FROM energy_consumption INNER JOIN energy_savings ON energy_consumption.process_id=energy_savings.process_id;
SELECT location_name, country_code, energy_usage FROM process_location INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON process_location.process_id=energy_consumption.process_id;
SELECT process_name, energy_usage, saving_amount FROM energy_consumption INNER JOIN energy_savings ON energy_consumption.process_id=energy_savings.process_id WHERE saving_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT process_name, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT process_name, location FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT operation_name, location, operation_type FROM supply_chain_operations ORDER BY operation_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_analysis WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT process_name, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT process_name, location, manager FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT analysis_id, start_date, total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_analysis WHERE total_energy_consumed > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT operation_name, location FROM supply_chain_operations WHERE operation_type = 'Logistics' AND location LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT operation_name FROM supply_chain_operations ORDER BY operation_name DESC;
SELECT process_id, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY process_id;
SELECT process_id, improvement_area FROM energy_improvement_areas WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT id, operation_name FROM supply_chain_operations WHERE operation_type='Production' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT process_id, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY process_id HAVING total_consumption > 1000;
SELECT process_id, SUM(total_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_summary WHERE month_year='2023-01-01' GROUP BY process_id;

SELECT process_name, improvement_area FROM manufacturing_processes JOIN energy_improvement_areas ON manufacturing_processes.id = energy_improvement_areas.process_id ORDER BY improvement_area ASC, process_name DESC;
